DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate skin age homogeneous population 77 year old patient select among PROOF cohort continuously investigated cardiological examination . Skin age explore macroscopic microscopic evaluation . In particular , skin age measure index clinical aging ( SCINEXA ) complementary measure facial photo , standard High Definition dermoscopy , elastography , sebumetry , vivo ex vivo confocal microscopy , classical histological examination .
